Mary is an avid gardener. Yesterday, she received 18 new potted plants from her favorite plant nursery. She already has 2 potted plants on each of the 40 window ledges of her large country home. Feeling generous, she has decided that she will give 1 potted plant from each ledge to friends and family tomorrow. How many potted plants will Mary remain with?
Now please strictly answer this question in the json format: "{"reasons": "(a string of your reasoning process)", "answer": "(a pure numeric value without unit)"}"

{"reasons": "Mary has 40 window ledges with 2 potted plants each, so she has a total of 40 * 2 = 80 potted plants. She received 18 new potted plants, so her total number of potted plants is now 80 + 18 = 98. She plans to give away 1 potted plant from each ledge, which means she will give away a total of 40 * 1 = 40 potted plants. Therefore, Mary will remain with 98 - 40 = 58 potted plants.", "answer": "58"}
